content: the herringbone single_crochet is my new favourite stitch it s easy dense and has a sleek modern look this bag is durable stylish and perfect for those summer outings to the beach market or your favourite downtown patio please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free at www lakesideloops com/neo **in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes ** written pattern in english us terms pictures video tutorial left hand pattern available upon request *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
